Content: It’s a complicated unit. Maybe Bamco will design a boss around her.
They should have called her Heisenberg_ not Alice
In contrary to a widespread belief_ crit rate up is not useless at all.NLBut... discord ain’t no place for a lecture on probability.
As a very crude rule of thumb_ +300 crit rate = +100 atk
You cannot grind 100% critical on a run with 150 hits.NLThe lifespan of the universe is not long enough.
Already a three-sigma run takes a lot of attempts_ from 50 to 100.NLA four-sigma is in the thousands.
Anything above this would take longer than the ranking duration
sigma = one standard deviation on a gaussian distribution
On the previous ranking_ one sigma meant +/- 100k damage_ with R5 stuff
